Learning Systems

Applying athletic training methodology to computer science education.

Status:
In Progress
Posts:
3 planned, 1 published

About This Series

I spent years training as a track athlete, learning how to break down complex movements into drillable components. That same systematic approach applies to learning algorithms, system design, and technical concepts. This series explores how athletic methodology translates to computer science education.

Systematic experimentation through rhythmic precision.
